title: Yale’s Famed Investing Model Fails at a Fraught Time for Colleges
description: Yale’s famed investing model worked until it didn't — colleges across the country had copied the Ivy League school’s bets on private equity and other illiquid investments. But now plain old stocks and bonds are outperforming. Janet Lorin explains (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Yale’s famed investing model worked until it didn't — colleges across the country had copied the Ivy League school’s bets on private equity and other illiquid investments. But now plain old stocks and bonds are outperforming. Janet Lorin explains (Source: Bloomberg)
